__e: A soldier told me that Major is French.
Let me show you where the major is.
Though after the major gets done with you, I expect he'll have me see you vanished.
You should have remembered you belong to the Major and not to me.
Maybe the major wants to know what...
Gentlemen, we've given the Major our parole... and we will serve him until I say we will not.
Not for me, thank you. I don't know about the major.
I know all that, but the major is not interested in our penicillin. He only wants to know the truth.
I know you will do what the British major wants.
The Major has just given me the most wonderful news.
Is that all? No. Not quite.
- Looks like the Major has got him.
When the doctor... The major said one of the things they had to do was give me a steel jaw I thought, "Great! A steel jaw!
-He said he was a defense witness.
It's just like the major said it would be.
